oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Maj. Albert Gallatin Harris
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Harris served as 1st Lt., Co. A, 12th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, also known as the Newbern Blues, under Col. Tyree Bell of Dyer County. He also served as Adjutant for Col. Robert Russell. Information on the back of the photograph identifies this as a picture of Harris in his lieutenant's uniform. He is holding a sword and wearing a hat. Another weapon is visible under his sash.
